name: Crazy Duck Hunter - for funny
description:
This hunter is very crazy,you will not believe.
FEATURES
4 Kinds of Weapons: hunting rifle、shotgun、machine gun、rocket launcher...
26 kinds of ducks: Space Duck、Mini duck、Zombie duck、Stealth duck、High-speed duck、Skull duck……
16 kinds of dogs:Jet Dog、Rocket Dog、Big ears Dog、and Superman……
3 Kinds of Modes: Duck Hunt Mode、Dog Hunt Mode,Crazy Mode,continuously updated...
4 Kinds of Maps: "field"、"cemetery"、"Desert"、"sea",continuously updated...
Dog Hunt Mode: The dogs in the game could also fly in the sky!

This game is very easy to play and has a lot of fun. Players just need to click on the screen to start hunting ducks.
